name: athlete_large_image
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool allscores.
Tool description: Beware! Our live match updates may be faster than other API's.
Enjoy our 24/7 wide coverage of real time scores data for 10 different sports and over 2,000 competitions worldwide, including Real-time Stats, Breaking News, In-Play Insights, Lineups, Live Tables, Fixtures, Social Buzz, Odds and much more.
Supported 10 Sports Types: Football, Rugby, Tennis, Basketball, Cricket, Ice Hockey, Baseball, Volleyball, American football and Handball.
API description: Fetches the large image for a specific athlete in the PNG format.

athleteid.description: The ID of the athlete whose large image is to be fetched.

imageversion.description: The version of the image to be fetched.
